content.p: Students: All students automatically become a member of the library when they receive their University student ID card. Staff: All members of staff (academic and non-academic) in the universityâ€™s become a member of the library when they receive their University staff ID card and register their account with the library. Membership to the library entitles you to: Associate: Please refer to the school or department that you are affiliated with to open an associate member account. Alumni: To join the library under external borrowers--alumni, members of the University Alumni Association must: Alumni members are entitled to: Visitor: Members of the public who would like to visit our library must bring an official letter from their place of employment or college/university that they are studying at, stating the purpose and duration of their visit. Visitors will only have access to the library collection on open shelves. Please see our contact page for telephone and email contact points.
